chapter.title: What's new in Spring Integration 2.2?
chapter.para: This chapter provides an overview of the new features and improvements that have been introduced with Spring Integration 2.2 If you are interested in even more detail, please take a look at the Issue Tracker tickets that were resolved as part of the 2.2 development process:

section.title: Spring-AMQP 1.1
section.para: Spring Integration now uses Spring AMQP 1.1. This enables several features to be used within a Spring Integration application, including...

itemizedlist.listitem: A fixed reply queue for the outbound gateway
Support for Dead Letter Exchanges/Dead Letter Queues

section.title: JPA Endpoints
section.para: Endpoints are now available for manipulating JPA entity objects.
